title: Lovely Stay
text: I had decided to stay at Comfort Inn because I had recently seen a commercial for Choice Hotels. After I was greeted by the staff, I had checked into my room and the cleanliness and the decor of the room was superb. I was later informed that they had recently renovated the motel. The breakfast was limited to coffee, tea, juice, cereal and pastries; however, san francisco had many different cuisines to offer us.
